imgDesc.text:
A peculiar stone carving. Use the adeptal energy granted by Fujin to move these heavy-looking stone carvings with ease.
It may be a stone carving, but for some reason, it looks all too carefree. Curious, just what was it modeled after...?
Listen to their languid words and put them back in the correct places. But remember, not all the stone carvings will return to their original positions willingly.
